text.text_translated: In 2003, Suzanne Collins watched TV one night. The US was in a war in Iraq. She saw shows about young people. They wanted to win money. She also saw news about the war. These two things started to mix. It felt strange to her. So, the idea for 'The Hunger Games' came to her.
